page.title: Weapon Barrels
page.text: Weapon Barrels are Upgrades for the Tools/Weapons. They can be applied to the weapon in the Weapon Station.

page.title: Dilithium Focusing Matrix
page.text: It increases the weapon damage but decreases the ammunition (in the case of energy, it increases the power use) and the Special Effect of the weapon. It can be applied on every weapon except of the Omni Tool.

page.title: Incendiary Filter
page.text: This module enables Fire Damage to be dealt with Mobs. The downside is that it takes twice as much ammo (power in case of energy weapons). It can be applied on every Weapon except of the Omni Tool.

page.title: Burst Inductive Drum
page.text: This module creates explosions on each hit. It also allows the weapon to destroy blocks, if powerful enough. The downside is that the fire rate is lowered significantly and the ammo usage is increased by 80%. It can be applied on every Weapon except of the Omni Tool.

page.title: Regenerative Converter
page.text: This module heals the player when the target take's damage from the weapon. Can only be applied to the Phaser.

page.title: Doomsday
page.text: Doomsday - Degenerative Explosive Focusing Matrix, This module increases the fire rate so your weapon will shoot faster but overheats quicker. On the Phaser it will deal splashdamage on the targeted block. It can be applied on every Weapon except of the Omni Tool.

page.title: V.E.N.O.M
page.text: V.E.N.O.M - Voxel Exaggerating Nullification Obliteration Matrix, This module allows the Omni Tool to break blocks much faster.
